alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:18PM EDT until April 08 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek At Cold Brook. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.6 feet on 09/06/1979. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 pm: 9.7 Forecast: Fri 2 am 13.6 Fri 8 am 9.8 Fri 2 pm 9.1 Fri 8 pm 8.5 Sat 2 am 7.8 Sat 8 am 7.2 Sat 2 pm 7.0 Sat 8 pm 6.8 Sun 2 am 6.6 Sun 8 am 6.3 Sun 2 pm 6.2 &&
